name: unassignCallingPlan
description:
Unassign a [calling plan](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/other-references/plans#zoom-phone-calling-plans) that was previously assigned to a [Zoom Phone](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/categories/360001370051) user. **Scopes**: `phone:write` `phone:write:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`
**Prerequisite:** 1. Business or Enterprise account 2. A Zoom Phone license

type.description: The [type](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/other-references/plans#zoom-phone-calling-plans) of the calling plan that was assigned to user. (e.g: The value of type would be "200" for Unlimited US/Canada calling plan.)
